name: AS gMap Light
author: Md Ashikur Rahman

sections.description:
As Gmap Light is a simple map image generator plugin. You can add your own map with it via shortcode and widget.

After installing Plugin you will get a widget which name is AS gMap Widget on your wordpress Admin panel. Put it any of your widget area with it’s configuration. You can find more information here

Donations

If you want to send any type of donation contact me Here

Thanks
sections.installation:
To install your Plugin. Follow This Steps.

  1. Upload as-google-maps to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Ask any type of Questions Here
Will be answered ASAP.

Thank You

Installation Instructions

To install your Plugin. Follow This Steps.

  1. Upload as-google-maps to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

screenshots.caption: After installing Plugin you will get a widget which name is AS gMap Widget on your wordpress Admin panel. Put it any of your widget area with it’s configuration. You can see the screenshot below.
You will Get some Form field in AS gMap Widget.

You will also get a Button on your wordpress Post editor Like this. With this button you can easily add a shortcode in your post or page. After clicking the button you will get a popup box. Which have same kind of form field that we see in widget box.
